    • Method Detail

      • getAPIKey

        public static String getAPIKey(String serviceName)
        Returns the apiKey from the VCAP_SERVICES or null if doesn't exists.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the API key or null if the service cannot be found.

      • getAPIKey

        public static String getAPIKey(String serviceName,
                               String plan)
        Returns the apiKey from the VCAP_SERVICES or null if doesn't exists. If plan is specified, then only credentials for the given plan will be returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        plan - the service plan: standard, free or experimental
        Returns:
        the API key

      • getUserNameAndPassword

        public static CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials getUserNameAndPassword(String serviceName)
        Returns the username and password as defined in the VCAP_SERVICES or null if they do not exist or are not accessible. This is a utility method for getUserNameAndPassword(String, String). Invoking this method is identical to calling getUserNameAndPassword(serviceName, null);
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service whose credentials are sought
        Returns:
        an object representing the service's credentials

      • getUserNameAndPassword

        public static CredentialUtils.ServiceCredentials getUserNameAndPassword(String serviceName,
                                                                        String plan)
        Returns the username and password as defined in the VCAP_SERVICES or null if they do not exist or are not accessible. If a plan is provided then only the credentials for that plan (and service) will be returned. Null will be returned if the plan does not exist.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of the service whose credentials are sought
        plan - the plan name
        Returns:
        an object representing the service's credentials

      • getAPIUrl

        public static String getAPIUrl(String serviceName)
        Gets the API url.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        Returns:
        the API url

      • getAPIUrl

        public static String getAPIUrl(String serviceName,
                               String plan)
        Returns the apiKey from the VCAP_SERVICES or null if doesn't exists. If plan is specified, then only credentials for the given plan will be returned.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the service name
        plan - the service plan: standard, free or experimental
        Returns:
        the API key

      • setServices

        public static void setServices(String services)
        Sets the VCAP_SERVICES variable. This is utility variable for testing
        Parameters:
        services - the VCAP_SERVICES
